TopicTitle: What happened to the jetpack mod?

Articles.Content: There used to be a jetpack mod, which was part of a project to turn KSP into an RPG. Does anyone know what happened to it?
Found the link to the original thread. Looks like it was abandoned http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51624-WIP-KerbolQuest-Jetpacks-Beta
